Uses of Package
org.javasimon.javaee

Packages that use org.javasimon.javaee
org.javasimon.javaee Java EE support for Simons contains Java EE components (servlet filter and EJB/CDI interceptor) that can be used or extended. 
org.javasimon.javaee.reqreporter Package contains classes reporting slow HTTP requests - interface RequestReporter and various (default) implementations. 
 

Classes in org.javasimon.javaee used by org.javasimon.javaee
HttpStopwatchSource.IncludeHttpMethodName
          Enum that represents modes of preserving HTTP methods names in Simons' names
 

Classes in org.javasimon.javaee used by org.javasimon.javaee.reqreporter
SimonServletFilter
          Simon Servlet filter measuring HTTP request execution times.
